How To Make Money From Your Phone

Now that we all walk around with a computer in our pockets and purses, wouldn’t it be great if we could put that technology to work for us. Well, we are going to show you how to make extra money from your phone with apps such as Cash4sms!

Can You Make Real Money From Your Phone?

We all could use a little extra money in our pockets. With all that our phones are capable of, many will wonder if they can use them to turn a profit. The answer is YES! There are fantastic opportunities to get a little extra cash without having to sit at a desk, just earn money with your phone!

You do need to be sure that you are careful and avoid potential scams. All of the methods we are going to highlight in this list of the best cashback apps and money making apps are safe and legit. Sticking to these opportunities to make money from your phone will make sure you and your information stays as safe as possible.

There are many apps out there that are not on this list, and we cannot vouch for any of them. If you are going to try an unknown app, be sure to follow best practices to avoid getting scammed or downloading malware. We cannot make any promises about the safety of phone apps to make money or other methods that are not listed in this article. If you do decide to try an app not listed here, we have some simple guidelines to help you protect yourself.

Some of the best ways to protect yourself online include:

  • Thoroughly review user reviews on app stores or other trusted sites on the internet.
  • Check to be sure that the app does not ask for permissions it does not need. If an app is looking for access to your emails, calls, or personal information and it does not seem to need those to function that could be a red flag. Investigate the app further.
  • Check to see how many downloads an app has. An app that has a lot of downloads without a lot of bad reviews is more likely to be legit.
  • Android users can take advantage of anti-malware software. Be sure to use a program from a trusted cybersecurity vendor. For iOS users, the operating system has lots of built in protections that help but also keep anti-malware from being functional.
  • Use common sense. The biggest thing you can do to protect yourself is to remember that if something looks too good to be true, it likely is. Promises of large amounts of income with little work or investment is a major red flag.

    • If you pay attention to those rules and avoid high risk apps and methods, you can make money from your phone with ease. Of course, the best way is to use the methods we list here and have confirmed as legitimate and safe.


    Best Legit Ways To Make Money On Your Phone

    Make Money From Your Phone Passively - Cash4sms

    Cash4sms might just be the best way to make money from your phone for most people. This is mostly due to the fact that it is entirely a passive way to get paid. Cash4sms works by sending you test SMS messages that companies use to test the stability and functionality of their networks. They send you text messages that are just strings of random text, and you do not have to even respond to them at all. Just sit back and earn money by receiving text messages!

    Cash4sms also lets you sell your unused SMS messages. You can tell the app how many messages you have unused in your plan each month, and Cash4sms will send those same test SMS messages from your phone. You make money texting from your phone, without even having to send any texts yourself.

    If you are looking for ways to make money from your phone passively, give Cash4sms a try. It’s a great app to use along with other ways to make money from your phone because it requires no extra interaction and you can just let it run in the background.

    Make A Profit With Micro Investing - Acorns

    Acorns is an investment app that lets you make cash by putting your spare change to work for you. You can invest small amounts of cash by rounding up your purchases to the nearest dollar and having that amount deposited into your account. They also get you started by giving you a free $10 when you sign up for the app, which also makes it one of the top choices for the best app to get free money.

    You can choose the risk profile that you want from a list of 5 different investment portfolios, which helps take some of the worry and decision making out of the investment process. Just choose the portfolio that fits you best, and let Acorns put your extra change to work. It all adds up over time. Of course, investing always has risk and it is not an instant method to make money from your phone. However, it will help you make and save cash over time. Acorns also helps you with tracking your finances, so you can better use the cash you earn.

    Make Cash Selling Photos - FOAP

    Do you take a lot of pictures and consider photography to be a hobby you are passionate about? Do you wonder how to make money from your phone with your photos? The answer is FOAP, one of the best phone apps to make money for photographers.

    FOAP lets you take the pictures you take every day and post them on the app. Once posted, marketers and brands can purchase them for use in their campaigns. You get $5 for each photo you sell, and the same photo can be sold over and over. That means that a particularly great photo could keep making you a profit for a long time. The more photos you post on the app, the more opportunities you have to get paid. FOAP also offers “missions” that you can submit pictures to, which if chosen pay a much larger amount of cash.

    If you are a shutterbug, selling pictures with FOAP is one of the easy ways to make money on your phon

    Run A Store From Your Phone - Shopify

    Shopify is a great solution for how to make money from your phone by running your own store. Shopify is a platform for running an online business that has an app that lets you manage your whole business right from your phone. After an initial setup on a desktop or laptop and picking a design for your store, you can run everything right from the app.

    Do you want to have a store but are worried that you don’t have anything to sell? Shopify has you covered there too. You can use one of their drop shipping add ons that connect you with companies that will let you sell their items and then they will ship them out for you. Shopify is one of the few phone apps to make money that gives you the ability to make the amount of profit that it does, without having to have an existing inventory of your own.

    Do Tasks For Cash - TaskRabbit

    TaskRabbit is an app that lets you take your skills and put them to use, or even just make some cash helping people do daily chores. People will post jobs that they need to have done, from picking up groceries to fixing their computer, and you can do that task and get paid. You can do tasks on task rabbit as a part time gig, or do it full time and take as many jobs as you can.

    If you have specialized skills that people need, then you can make a lot more pay from each gig as the rates will be higher. This makes it a great app for people who can do in-home tech support, carpentry, landscaping, or any other skilled job.

    Conclusion

    In this article we told you how to make money from your phone by using a variety of safe and legitimate apps. There are some great options out there depending on how much time or effort you are willing to put in. You can easily make money selling photos, running an online store, or doing tasks for people that need them.

    For more passive ways to make income, you can make money texting from your cell phone or receiving texts with Cash4sms. You could even just save and invest your spare change! Hopefully one of these apps will be a fit for you, and help you start making money using your phone.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Do some apps actually give you money?

    Some apps will absolutely give you money, though how much you get will depend on the app. Some apps will give you cash back for items you purchase, while others will give you money in return for you completing a task like filling out a survey or receiving text messages.

    How to make money from my phone for free?

    The best ways to make money from your phone for free is by using an app such as Cash4sms. You can sit back and receive text messages or sell your unused SMS and get paid.

    What phone apps give you money?

    There are many phone apps out there that will give you money for completing various tasks or will give you cash back for shopping. Some of the top apps include Cash4sms, FOAP, Shopify, Task Rabbit, and Acorns.

    How can I make passive income with my cell phone?

    Yes, you can make passive income with your cell phone by receiving text messages, or selling your unused text messages with an app such as Cash4sms. They pay you to receive SMS messages that service providers use to test the stability and functionality of their networks.

    Is the Cash4sms app free to use?

    Yes, Cash4sms is completely free to use. It is a legitimate app that lets you get paid to receive SMS messages, or sell unused SMS messages from your monthly plan. However, Cash4sms is only available on Android phones.
